commentary.static: Disruption resolved by rerouting Truck T4 from Warehouse 1 to Warehouse 2 via Warehouse 3. Triangular road network shows a visible course change.

Truck T4 commences detour, turning toward Warehouse 3 on the upper edge of the triangle.
T4 passes Warehouse 3 and turns toward Warehouse 2, rejoining normal flow.
Inventories balanced: WH1 = 450, WH3 = 450, WH2 = 600. Network flow stabilizes.
ETA recovery within tolerance; downstream service levels preserved.
